oneOf.title: CorporateActionAdjustment
oneOf.description: The intent is to take into effect the occurrence of a Corporate Action and the particular Corporate Action at stake shall be further specified in CorporateActionTypeEnum.

oneOf.title: Decrease
oneOf.description: The intent is to Decrease the quantity of the position.

oneOf.title: Increase
oneOf.description: The intent is to Increase the quantity of the position.

oneOf.title: OptionExercise
oneOf.description: The intent is to Exercise a position or part of a position.

oneOf.title: PositionCreation
oneOf.description: The intent is to form a position from a fully formed contract.

oneOf.title: Transfer
oneOf.description: The intent is to transfer the position to another clearing member.

oneOf.title: Valuation
oneOf.description: The intent is to update the valuation of the position.
